post:
Hello guys, We have refilled stocks with 20 Atom servers !
Feel free to ask if you have any question.

**Specifications**
-Atom family processor
-4 GB Ram
-1 TB Sata Hd
-100 Mbps Full Duplex unmetered
-Location : France

**Choice of OS**
-Debian 8
-Debian 9
-Centos 7
-Ubuntu 16.04
-No OS / install through KVM

**Price**
-Price : 10.15$ excl VAT/Mo
-no setup fee

**Accepted methods of payments**
-Paypal
-Credit cards
-Bank tranfer

**Order link**
https://commande.ikoula.com/?affid=174

**Server administration**
-Root
-Reboot
-Reset
-Customized reverse DNS
-Customized secondary DNS
-MX rescue
-Rescue system tools are available on https://extranet.ikoula.com

**IP / Network**
-Extra IPv4 is charged 2.50€ / Month (limited to five).
-Ipv6 available but not configured by default.
-You can test network at http://lg.ikoula.com/
-DRAC / KVMoIP Not incluted, a KVM can be rent for 24h.

**Info**
Operating since 1998 and we own two datacenters. More info <a href="https://www.ikoula.com/en/ikoula-datacenter-france">here</a>.
